description:
Super-breathable trail shoes for a hike in a National Park or an overnight camping trip. Aeration channels in the midsole keep things breezy on hot summer days. A waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry if you take an unexpected dip. And Vibram soles give you mountain goat-like balance on wet or slippery terrain.

  • Tough mesh upper with Nano Cell 2.0 structure offers durable breathability
  • Breathable GORE-TEX SURROUND® membrane keeps water out
  • Ortholite insole adds cushioning underfoot
  • Compression-moulded EVA midsole with STB Control gives you comfort, stability and snugness
  • Aeration channels in the midsole help keep your feet dry and cool
  • Vibram® XS Trek outsole grips whatever the trail throws at you
name: La Sportiva Spire Gore-Tex Surround Light Trail Shoes - Men's
